text:
Hi all :slightly_smiling_face:
Quick question.
I have 2 domain : one primary and one scondary.
Both of them have password protected pages, +login, +registration.
Question. How can we register a user via API and specify a domain ? Because now I can add a contact, and they will receive email from Main Domain, but I want to send it from Secondary Domain.
Is this possible ?
And how in contact list can we separate contact from main and secondary domain ?!
Thank you
